GSD.product_version: versions from v3.16 to before v5.4.178
GSD.description:
scsi: bnx2fc: Make bnx2fc_recv_frame() mp safe

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.178 by commit 53e4f71763c61a557283eb43301efd671922d1e8, it was introduced in version v3.16 by commit d576a5e80cd07ea7049f8fd7b303c14df7b5d7d2. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: scsi: bnx2fc: Make bnx2fc_recv_frame() mp safe
